org.apache.hadoop.tools

Class TableListing

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.tools.TableListing

  • @InterfaceAudience.Private
public class TableListing
extends Object
    This class implements a "table listing" with column headers. Example: NAME OWNER GROUP MODE WEIGHT pool1 andrew andrew rwxr-xr-x 100 pool2 andrew andrew rwxr-xr-x 100 pool3 andrew andrew rwxr-xr-x 100
